website_summaries.verdict: A durable hairbrush cleaner that works on brushes and combs of all shapes and sizes.
pros: Able to clean any type of hairbrush without causing  damage
Holds up well to regular usage
Firm bristles that don't bend or break
cons: More difficult to clean than some of the others listed here

customer_reviews.title: Nest of Fluff
customer_reviews.text: I have very long hair that seems to trap thing like dust, stuffing fluff, cat hair, small children, etc. My wet brush, and for all of you also have one you know how dingy they get just after one use, was a safe haven for all of this. I try to pick out my hair after brushing, but the nest of leave in conditioner and fluff holds on like magnets. With some Windex, warm water and 3 minutes of scrubbing, my brush looks brand new. It's easy enough to do once a week. Don't be afraid to get a little aggressive with the scrubbing, it will work out in your favor.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Try another product 1 - did not really work. It took out some of the hair on my brush but definitely not most of it. 2 - can not be returned (Amazon policy)
customer_reviews.author: LikesAmazonGuy

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the tool I never knew I needed. It may seem like a silly thing to spend money on when you can clean your brush out by hand but this gets so much more out of the brush! It's easy and rather enjoyable. Who wants to brush their nice clean hair with a brush full of dirty oily hair and dust. When you really think about it makes you want to throw out all your old brushes. I will be buying these as gifts for all my girlfriends.
customer_reviews.author: emmaline

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a Denman paddle brush. With some shampoo this brush actually lathers and cleans very well, getting rid of all the hair on my paddle brush as well as any dandruff type residue. I just scrub back and forth, and it only takes a few minutes to get my paddle brush looking like the day I bought it. This cleaner brush is also fairing well - have had it for a few years now and none of the bristles have fallen out or bent. I'm glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Works overall, hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: This works fairly well at removing hair and lint from my boars bristled nylon brush. It cannot remove all lint that sticks to the boars bristles, even when raking with the brush part several times. Simply transfers lint from the brush to the cleaner, which is difficult to clean. Works with some effort. Cleaning this is time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Something off Amazon everyone should have!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used an old toothbrush to clean my hairbrushes, but this is a game changer!! The point aids in bulk hair removal. After soaking, the long stiff bristles are able to reach down, grab and remove all that caked on yuck that builds up on the brush itself. Oh, you know you got some yuck on your brush! This little guy is amazing, I will be giving them as holiday gifts to friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: Scarletthairedgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great brush cleaner ,deserves the high rating.
customer_reviews.text: This makes the drudgery of cleaning a brush go pretty fast and painlessly ! Nice firm bristles make the job go pretty fast. Even tho it comes with no how to manual, it is pretty easy to figure out hold it in one hand moving it against the bristles of the brush to be cleaned in the other, and it quickly picks up the hair built up. Then with the thumb and forefinger, just pinch and draw off the hairs it picked up , dispose of ,and repeat til done. The flat end is used to get at the little bit that may be left over.
customer_reviews.author: ColdShot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars For This Great Device
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs this if you brush your hair. It's the absolute easiest way to clean your hairbrush that I've ever seen. The pointed end goes under the hair on the brush and lifts it right up and off. The small brush on the end goes between the bristles to remove any hair product or dirt on the brush base and then the longer teeth gets in and helps remove hair product from your brush bristles before you wash (or don't wash) your hairbrush. No home should be without it.
customer_reviews.author: CharmY2K

customer_reviews.title: Meh, doesn't do much for me
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy tool. Useful for lifting hair from the brush, but you could do that with a tooth pick. Brushes don't actually do much, and doesn't help cleaning the actual bristles (you know, the lint). Perhaps it's the way my hair brush is designed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mc. P.

customer_reviews.title: This is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: OMGoodness! Isn't it a pain trying to clean your brushes!!? This is the greatest thing since sliced bread! Seriously! My brushes have never been so clean! Whoever thought of this is a genius! LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Honestly Me

customer_reviews.title: OMG Who Knew I Needed This Thing?
customer_reviews.text: So I have a wetbrush that I adore but it gets clogged with residue from my hair products. I used to have to soak my brush in warm water and soap and baking soda for several hours to strip it entirely of this built up product film. But this cleaner gets between the little bristles and rips out all the product residue left on my brush without soaking. LOVE IT! I seriously love this stupid little thing.
customer_reviews.author: William tell-you-like-it-is

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of lint build up in my brush and it is such a pain to get the lint out and very time consuming when I do try and clean it. Let me tell you this brush CLEANED the lint out within 3 minutes. Took no effort. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: i don't know how i lived without this for so long, before: i typically used to soak y hairbrushes in shampoo water once a week and tediously take out the hair with a toothbrush, ad frankly recycle my hairbrushes every 6 months now: all it takes is ~10 sec of cleaning after every use must buy
customer_reviews.author: Compulsive Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Hair brush cleaner or pet stain remover
customer_reviews.text: This came with my ship n shape hair brush cleaner. The cleaner is great, but as a hair stylist, I would recommend the liquid format. This brush I use for other uses, like cleaning the grout lines in my kitchen. It's very hard bristles so it works great. It's great for getting pet stains out, spray on Resolve and scrub away. I am in love with this brush. © 2016 Jackie Paulson
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Paulson

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it-handy tool
customer_reviews.text: Seems kind of pricey for a piece of plastic, but it's a great tool. It's well made, too, for what it is- I doubt any of the bristles will ever fall out. It certainly gets the job done, both removing the hair from the hairbrush and getting down to where the bristles are attached to clean the cylinder or spine of the brush itself. The bristles are quite stiff, and they collect all that little fuzz very well. It would probably work well to clean in other hard-to-reach places, like between keys on a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy R

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life
customer_reviews.text: A great tool to get into tight bristled hair brushes. I have used it on my large barrel brush, as well as a lint brush that got so full it was depositing lint on my clothes instead of removing it. This cleaner surprisingly did a great job on the small particles. I could just go to town, and now my brushes are like new. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kmt22

customer_reviews.title: Just eh
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from this, although I’m not sure why. It’s basically just a thin brush with coarse bristles and a pointy end. A comb with a pointy end would work just as well. I wanted something to clear out the fuzzies that build up, but no such luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: Nice Job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to clean my dog's hair brush. This brush cleaner did a really good job getting long and short hairs out of the dog brush I have for my short haired dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super handy tool
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty amazed at how useful and helpful this product is. I was skeptical when purchasing it and thought I might be wasting my money. Definitely a handy thing to have around. I use it to clean my Shine Wet Brush (the one that has both plastic and boar bristles) and i have used it to clean a regular round brush as well. It works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Anne MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: awesome tool to clean hairbrushes
customer_reviews.text: Makes keeping your hairbrush nice and clean. Great tool and gets all that lint and dust or whatever that is at the root of the brush up and out! Very handy and quality made.
customer_reviews.author: My2Cents

customer_reviews.title: Works Well For Me
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. With my arthritic & sensitive hands, I was finding it difficult to clear the hair from my hairbrush.
customer_reviews.author: mmbar42

customer_reviews.title: Made my life better.
customer_reviews.text: Oh, this has made my life better. It works so well for removing hair and fluff from my brushes. I'm kinda mad I didn't buy this a few years ago. It's exactly what I wanted. I have trigger fingers on both hands that would lock up when cleaning the brushes. Now, no more pain and swearing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You didn't know you needed this til you had it
customer_reviews.text: So excited to finally have a better way to clean my hair brushes and not fight with all the lint, hair, fuzz bombs, sheet particles, towel remnants, etc. All stuck in my brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L. Crist

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Cleans out other hair brushes effectively and much ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Cleans out other hair brushes effectively and much sturdier than the wire brush cleaner by Olivia Garden. That's the kind I had before and hair always got stuck in it and the wires got bent up. This one not only cleans brushes effectively, it also is easy to clean itself. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ash

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well after soaking my brushes in a cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Chrysty Vance

customer_reviews.title: Now I need a hairbrush cleaner for my hair brush ...
customer_reviews.text: Now I need a hairbrush cleaner for my hair brush cleaner. This was an impulse buy. Go with a wire one.
customer_reviews.author: ATodd

customer_reviews.title: Just What I've Been Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for this exact brush cleaner for YEARS! It's the perfect tool for cleaning out hairbrushes, and you'll be shocked how much dust, hair and dead skin cells (yuck) this tool will clean off your brushes. After thoroughly cleaning with this tool, I like to scrub my brushes with little castille soap like Dr. Bronners and then let them soak. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: No surprises
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff bristles, seems like a product that will last. I have purchased other brands with metal bristles, one of witch fell apart half way through the first test run on my hairbrush with minimal hair in it. No surprises. Exactly what I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect to clean your hairbrushes and combs
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to clean your hairbrushes and combs. This cleans everything out of your hairbrushes without damaging the bristles on your hairbrush. A couple of swipes across your brush removes all the hair. I use the small end to clean the base of the bristles. I liked this so well I purchased one for my daughter. This is so much faster to clean hair from your brush than using a comb, pick, or another brush. I would not want to be without this brush cleaner. You will not regret purchasing this brush cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: smilie

customer_reviews.title: Cleans your brush well...but can be a pain to clean the cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product easily gets out all of the hair from my brushes and it does everything well except for one thing. Trying to get all of the hair out of the hairbrush cleaner can prove difficult with the shorter and finer hair strands. If this is not a problem for you then I I will would say you have nothing to lose with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Coleman-Sanders

customer_reviews.title: A much needed item
customer_reviews.text: A great brush to clean out hair from brushes and combs. A little item that does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This hairbrush cleaner works very well and I wish I had gotten one sooner. Very easy to use and gets right down to the bristle pad. Now if I could only figure out how to get rid of the bits wrapped around the very top of the bristles!
customer_reviews.author: iamfinicky

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, this one REALLY cleans my brushes and combs! I had tried alcohol, soap, vinegar...all different things at different times to try to remove built-up gel and hair spray, but nothing ever got rid of those things completely. I applied this brush cleaner DRY onto my brushes and combs, and it got the yuckies off immediately. I did rinse them afterward, but that was just to get off all of the stuff that had come off.
customer_reviews.author: King Julien

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how well this would work but it does clean out my boar bristle hairbrushes really well. My only complaint is it's now hard to clean this out as for some reason my hair attracts a lot of lint!
customer_reviews.author: classicalgeek

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little tool
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this really works! The hair stuck in my and my daughter's brushes drives me crazy, and I have spent ages trying to clean it out in the past. This nifty little tool does the trick in no time. Bonus - you can use it to remove fuzz build-up from velcro as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: I L-O-V-E this brush cleaner. I am a hairdresser ...
customer_reviews.text: I L-O-V-E this brush cleaner. I am a hairdresser so I am cleaning hair out of my brushes all day and everyday. This brush cleaner quickly end effectively removes hair from my brushes with just a few swipes. It doesn't seem to scratch up my brushes as much as the Olivia Garden metal brush rake either. Any product that makes my life run more efficiently deserves a 5 gold stars!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Dean

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this once to clean my brush and a few of the bristles are already bent. Not sure how long this will last.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriejg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is great for cleaning my round boar bristle hair brush. The bristles are very sturdy and I think it will hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Okie Girl

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've always wrecked regular combs trying to clean out my hairbrushes from my thick hair. This does the job and keeps on going! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Holton

customer_reviews.title: This is quick and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: this is the most handy tool for cleaning my brushes and combs. It cleans my long hair out of my brush in a flash and the bristles are stiff so they clean your brush really well in between washing with brush cleaner. I like to use clean brushes and combs, well like MOST people do, but I have arthritis and sometimes it hurts to pick the hair out between the bristles. This is just quick and easy. It works well to wash your brush too, because it really gets in there and scrubs.
customer_reviews.author: RobinTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Makes cleaning the hair and fuzz out of brushes a lot easier. Good for preventing buildup over time that would usually cause me to just buy a new brush. I use this mostly with my wet brush.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to keep brushes clean
customer_reviews.text: Always struggled to get my brushes clean. This did the trick. I’m happy, my hair’s happy.
customer_reviews.author: Double J

customer_reviews.title: Buy a good brush and keep it clean!
customer_reviews.text: One day, I woke up and thought "I haven't cleaned by hair brushes for a very long time." My parents had a brush for cleaning combs and brushes so I went to Amazon to search for one. This little gem is sturdy and works very well at getting out hair and scrubbing up the brushes. I'd rather clean a good brush than constantly replace cheap brushes when they are dirty.
customer_reviews.author: MJ2trip

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Stiff
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my hot brushes to clean off the gunk that accumulates on it. I use various products on my hair and it gets stuck between the teeth on my hair tools. Using this keeps my hot tools clean. I have recommended this item to QVC when advertising the Calista Tools. This works great!!
customer_reviews.author: GrandMama2

customer_reviews.title: The best brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for several years now to clean my Denman styling brush. I have recently started using a Kent hair brush also and in my opinion this Denman brush cleaner works better than the Kent brush cleaner on Kent's brushes. So I ordered a second one for my travel kit. I have nothing but praise for Kent and Denman brushes, but this Denman cleaner is just perfect for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Great brush cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of a brush to clean a brush before this one. It works. It’s simple. And I like it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Souza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little tool!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! I had a couple boars hair brushes that, despite regular washing, had a buildup of fuzz and gross deep in the bristles. This little tool got them looking new again. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karyn H.

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well at cleaning out my boar's hair/nylon hybrid brushes ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well at cleaning out my boar's hair/nylon hybrid brushes that got pretty gunked up with a dust/dandruff/oil combo over time. Didn't get them perfectly clean or anything but I think worked as well as something like this could
customer_reviews.author: Soyokaze

customer_reviews.title: This brush cleaner really works!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is amazing. I cleaned all my brushes and they look like they’re new again. This little gizmo-brush even got the lint out. It took a little work, but I got it out. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brush cleaner, works for other things too!
customer_reviews.text: This hair brush cleaner is wonderful, and works for far more than hair brushes and combs. I bought two, one for my hair brushes and combs, and the other to clean out my Roomba brushes and shower nozzles. The pointed end makes removing hair wound around brushes easy. The strait bristle end cleans groves and shower nozzles. Fantastic brush cleaner, well worth the reasonable price, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chicksy

customer_reviews.title: easy and priced well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sort of blindly after looking at these products online. I think it is a great product and works very well. It is priced just right. I does get all of the white fuzzies out of a brush like one of the previous reviews said. Love it! Still love this brush. Very effective. Considering purchasing this for gifts. Nothing is better than giving something you love and very practical. I know that everyone I would give this to would love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aubergine

customer_reviews.title: Best hairbrush cleaner/fix search issue
customer_reviews.text: This Denman one is the best! Sturdy, big enough. I LOVE mine and wanted 2 more (upstairs, pet’s brush...). Could not find at all searching with 3 words: hair brush cleaner. Only found cheaper, smaller ones. Thought it was gone. Finally searched back through my old orders. Denman one is listed with 2 words: hairbrush cleaner! Maybe that’s why it doesn’t show up. Denman, fix the search issue through Amazon, so people can find the best one!!
customer_reviews.author: Tini Maier

customer_reviews.title: best hairbrush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Does a great job of cleaning the nasty fuzzies that accumulate at the base of the hairbrush bristles. Best cleaner I've used, better than the ones that came with my Kent - or my Denman! - hairbrush. better than the Olivia Garden brush cleaner I bought. I'd buy another, and I'd recommend this to someone looking for a brush cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Louie524

customer_reviews.title: Cleans all styles
customer_reviews.text: My family uses a variety of brushes on our thick hair. This is the first product I've found that effectively cleans All our brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Charla C. Bufkin

customer_reviews.title: but I'm happy for the win at this stage
customer_reviews.text: It works for all of the hairbrushes. I don't know how all of these girls have any hair on their heads with all the hair they leave everywhere else. Cleaning out all the brushes is just a drop in the bucket.. but I'm happy for the win at this stage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeb McCoy

customer_reviews.title: If you have Paddle brushes this little item is fabulous for cleaning them.
customer_reviews.text: Love Denman brushes and particularly love this cleaning brush. It is simply the best for cleaning any type of hair brush.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had cleaner brushes! This tool makes it so easy to clean hair brushes, its addictive to clean them :)
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are thick and sturdy which makes for an easy cleaning when the time comes. The pointy tip of the cleaner makes taking out a lot of hair on larger brushes easier too.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the brush & super effective
customer_reviews.text: A must for the Denman brush or any stiffer bristle brush. Seems simple to just use your hands to clean out your brush, but this is effective & quick.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Ok hair brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This hair brush cleaner is okay. Not as good as I had hoped for, but it helps some. I would like to try another type next time.
customer_reviews.author: PA female

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how I lived without this! A great little tool for cleaning your hair brushes better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi

customer_reviews.title: Simple and does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is very handy for trying to clean hairbrushes. It does exactly what it says and is of good quality. I looked at other options and thought this looked the sturdiest and I'm glad I purchased, seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: This hair brush cleaner is a Handy Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed its design for it works for its purpose! This appealed to me so much that I've given it as a surcee to many friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Bug

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful! I finally found a tool that effectively ...
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful! I finally found a tool that effectively gets rid of all the lint and dust in my hairbrush. I tried other tools, but they ended up breaking. This one is very durable
customer_reviews.author: Halie Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean the hair and lint out of my Wet Brush. The pointed tip allows you to pull up the hair, and the bristles work well at removing the lint and ripping the hair out of the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Glad to find this product. My brushes needed cleaning and was never as easy as using this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Bill P.

customer_reviews.title: quality but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job on most of the combs. product quality is also good
customer_reviews.author: newday

customer_reviews.title: Best tool ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool I can't believe how well it works I hate to clean my brushes this little tool dose the work in seconds it is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Now it is so easy to clean my hairbrushes! Fast and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this is really nice. It’s super durable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: JEllenAll

customer_reviews.title: This is a marvelous alterantive to whatever you have been doing!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I have lived my whole life and never had such a unique tool to clean long think hair out of my brushes! It is inexpensive yet well made. I will mostly buy a few more as gifts for my long hair friends. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The best. Exactly as described by seller. No more using a #2 pencil to clean the hair out of my brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen L Phelps

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: GREAT COMB tool for cleaning hair brushes. as a stylist iv'e purchased other styles & this one" is the best..
customer_reviews.author: michael j steiner

customer_reviews.title: Good idea for a stocking stuffer or for anyone who is really into beauty products and maintaining them
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool little item that you'll usually never find in a store. I like that the brush parts of this cleaner are stiff, so you can really scrub into your dirty/dusty brush if needed. Item came exactly as described, right on.
customer_reviews.author: CMCampbell

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is seriously amazing. I cleaned all 4 of my round brushes as well as 12 of my other brushes in about 10 minutes if not less. It is amazing! I will definitely recommend and keep purchasing this brush whenever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey P

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this years aog?!
customer_reviews.text: Never knew how much I really needed this tool. Love it, so easy to clean my brushes now!

customer_reviews.title: Great hair tool
customer_reviews.text: Great comb/brush when trying to part my daughter hair. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for cleaning your hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: After using this tool and giving my hairbrushes a good soak, they look like new. Best tool for cleaning hairbrushes I have seen!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn orth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best comb-brush for cleaning hair out of my hairbrush. I have thick curly hair and this really clears it out of my hairbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Greying American

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush cleaners.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the hair and gunk in my brushes and combs!
customer_reviews.author: Calisissy

customer_reviews.title: hardly use it
customer_reviews.text: You would have to clean this which takes longer than cleaning my brush
customer_reviews.author: liljana acevska

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Little Tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool makes it a lot easier to clean my hair brushes. It incorporates all the features of different types of tools that I have used for this purpose in the past in one piece!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was apprehensive but it actually works and makes cleaning my hairbrush a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Great little product you don’t know you need! Cleans hairbrushes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant product! It cleaned my disgusting hair-filled brush, with just one swipe. An amazing product! If I could give it 6 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: shana van waters

customer_reviews.title: Something you didn't know you needed until you got it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Something you didn't know you needed until you get it!! I love this brush cleaner! Works great! The pointed end really allows you to get into the slots of the brush and get all that hair and product out of there!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hance

customer_reviews.title: Cleans brushes great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It works really well! Anyone who wants a clean brush needs this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Useful hair brush tool
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed using this tool. I used to clean my hair brushes with an old toothbrush, but this works much better. The pointed end is excellent for removing hair from the brush. It works for my long hair and also for my husband's short hair on his brush. It is not something that anyone needs, but it certainly is useful.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Neeley Freitag

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent for cleaning my hair brush and it is so easy! My hairbrush Stays clean and it's simple to maintain. I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Radiant Star

customer_reviews.title: Really cleans brushes well!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a couple times, but it really cleans out my boar bristle brushes! It even gets the lint and dust looking particles out.
customer_reviews.author: Botwentyone

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Love it! in a few minutes a hair brush was clean of hair and lint . Had a little trouble removing the lint from the cleaning brush itself, but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work on tightly clustered bristles
customer_reviews.text: Helps get the hair out, but so would a pencil. It doesn't get the dust and oil clustered at the roots of my brush. So I still feel like I'm brushing that stuff through my hair.
customer_reviews.author: E. Meissen

customer_reviews.title: WOWZA! THIS TOOL IS AMAZING! MY LIFE IS NOW COMPLETE THAT I HAVE A BRUSH CLEANER!
customer_reviews.text: How on earth did I ever survive without a brush cleaner! Omg this thing is amazing!!! Cleans boar hair bristles good!
customer_reviews.author: icarus anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use and works great .
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not blown away
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. I was hoping that it would do a better job of getting my brushes clean
customer_reviews.author: Alexis1111

customer_reviews.title: Look no further...
customer_reviews.text: Get this product it really works... All you need is some warm water & shampoo and your brush will look like new it doesn’t matter how dirty it is I’m telling you... it works
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Very sturdy little tool
customer_reviews.text: The Denman Hair Brush Cleaner works like a charm. Completely rids brushes of hair in seconds while being gentle on the bristles. Great little tool!
customer_reviews.author: Totally Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is great! I love the pick at one end and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I love the pick at one end and the brushes work really well for getting hair out of my brushes before cleaning them. I used to use a comb for this, but this brush cleaner works so much better than a comb and is not expensive. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: iPad mama

customer_reviews.title: I use this tool constantly to keep my brushes clear ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool constantly to keep my brushes clear of oil/dirt hair. So simple, takes seconds to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I used to use a comb to clean hairs out of my hairbrush. This works better, quicker, easier.
customer_reviews.author: Tapper

product_meta.title: Denman Hairbrush Cleaning Brush for Effective Hairbrush Cleaning, DBC1
feature_bullets: 3 WAY BRUSH CLEANER: Ergonomically designed & provides you comfort & grip.
STIFF BRISTLES BRUSH: Stiff bristles in the brush head which removes hair from any hairbrush.
MULTI USE CLEANING TOOL: Bristles at end of the brush can be used to remove hair, dust and fluff.
STURDY CONSTRUCTION: Cleaning brush is made with high-quality plastic and has a long life.
CARE INSTRUCTION: Wash in warm, soapy water. Rinse and leave to dry away from direct heat and sunlight.
